DOC.brief_summary: Current guideline recommend Routine daily chest radiograph ( CXRs ) mechanically ventilated patient intensive care unit ( ICUs ) . However , ICUs shift On-demand strategy , CXR prescribe warranted patient 's status morning physical examination . Here investigator compare Routine On-demand strategy 21 French ICUs . The work hypothesis CXR prescription would fall least 20 % On-demand strategy , reduction quality care .
